name: grinwide
description: Grin widely like a Cheshire cat

messages.firstPerson: You flash {target} your widest, most enthusiastic grin.
messages.secondPerson: {actor} flashes you a grin so wide it might be legally considered a threat.
messages.thirdPerson: {actor} grins widely at {target} with alarming enthusiasm.
messages.untargeted: You grin widely, showing all your teeth like a Cheshire cat on caffeine.
messages.untargetedRoom: {actor} grins widely, showing all their teeth. It's slightly unsettling.
